content: मध्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मन्-यत् नस्य धः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Middle, central, being in the middle or centre; <ls>Me. 46</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 21</ls> {@--2@} Intervening, intermediate. {@--3@} Middling, moderate, of a middling size or quality, mediocre; प्रारभ्य विघ्नविहता विरमंति मध्याः <ls>Bh. 2. 27.</ls> {@--4@} Neutral, impartial. {@--5@} Just, right. {@--6@} Mean (in <ab>astr.</ab>). --ध्यः , --ध्यं {@--1@} The middle, centre, middle or central part; अह्नः मध्यं midday; सहस्रदीधितिरलंकरोति मध्यमह्नः <ls>Māl. 1</ls> ‘the sun is on the meridian’ or ‘right over-head’; सरति सहसा बाह्वोर्मध्यं गताप्यबला सती <ls>M. 4. 11</ls>; व्योपमध्यं <ls>V. 2. 1.</ls> {@--2@} The middle of the body, the waist; मध्यं क्षामा <ls>Me. 82</ls>; वेदिविलग्नमध्या <ls>Ku. 1. 39.</ls>; विशालवक्षास्तनुवृत्तमध्यः <ls>R. 6. 32.</ls> {@--3@} The belly, abdomen; मध्येन… बलित्रयं चारु बभ र बाला <ls>Ku. 1. 39.</ls> {@--4@} The inside or interior of anything. {@--5@} A middle state or condition. {@--6@} The flank of a horse. {@--7@} Mean time in music. {@--8@} The middle term of a progression. {@--9@} Cessation, pause, interval. --ध्या {@--1@} The middle finger. {@--2@} A young woman, one arrived at puberty. --ध्यं Ten thousand billions. [The <ab>acc.</ab>, <ab>instr.</ab>, <ab>abl.</ab> and <ab>loc.</ab> singulars of मध्य are used adverbially. ({%a%}) मध्यं into the midst of, into; ({%b%}) मध्येन through or between. ({%c%}) मध्यात् out of, from among, from the midst (with <ab>gen.</ab>); तेषां मध्यात् काकः प्रोवाच <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> ({%d%}) मध्ये {1} in the middle, between, among, in the midst; <ls>R. 12. 29.</ls> {2} in into, within, inside, <ab>oft.</ab> as the first member of adverbial compounds; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} मध्येगंगं into the Ganges; मध्येजठरं in the belly; <ls>Bv. 1. 61</ls>; मध्येनगरं inside the city; मध्येनदि in the middle of the river. मध्येपृष्ठं on the back; मध्येभक्तं a medicine taken in the middle of one's meals; मध्येरणं in the battle; <ls>Bv. 1. 128</ls>; मध्येसभं in or before an assembly; <ls>N. 6. 76</ls>; मध्येसमुद्रं in the midst of the sea; <ls>Śi. 3. 33</ls>].
